name: Battle Of Europe
description: You must prove that the RAF is a force to be reckoned with!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/Windows 7 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: AGP GeForce 3+ or ATI Radeon 8500+ or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
